changePlan.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you get access to new features immediately. When downgrading, the new plan takes effect from the next billing period.

athleteLimit.question: What happens if I have more athletes than my plan allows?
athleteLimit.answer: You keep access to all existing athletes, but you cannot add new ones until you either upgrade or remove some athletes.

payment.question: How does payment work?
payment.answer: We use Stripe for secure payments. You can pay by card and will be billed automatically every month or year depending on your chosen billing period.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free and you can use it as long as you want with up to 2 athletes.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you get access to new features immediately.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards via Stripe. Invoicing is also available for Business and Enterprise plans.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel at any time?
cancelAnytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You keep access to the service until the end of your billing period.

hero.title: Run faster with
hero.description: Combine scientific precision with modern technology. Get tailored training programs based on your lactate tests, heart rate zones and daily readiness.

features.title: Everything you need to improve
features.description: From advanced tests to daily follow-up – we give you the tools that elite athletes use.

dynamicPrograms.title: Dynamic Programs
dynamicPrograms.description: Training programs that adapt to your progress and your daily readiness.

lactateZones.title: Lactate & Zones
lactateZones.description: Exact training zones based on your lactate tests for optimal intensity control.

readinessHrv.title: Readiness & HRV
readinessHrv.description: Daily health check that adjusts today's workout based on your recovery.

racePrediction.title: Race Prediction
racePrediction.description: See what you can achieve in the 10K, half marathon or marathon based on your data.

deepAnalysis.title: Deep Analysis
deepAnalysis.description: Track your progress over time with clear graphs and trends.

smartCalendar.title: Smart Calendar
smartCalendar.description: Plan your season and peak your fitness exactly when it matters.

science.title: Built on science, not guesswork.
science.description: We use proven methods to ensure every step counts. By basing your training on actual physiological data, you minimize injury risk and maximize results.
science.step1Description: Perform lactate or field tests to find your thresholds.
science.step2Description: We calculate your zones and create a profile of your strengths and weaknesses.
science.step3Description: Follow a program that knows exactly what pace you should hold today.

cta.title: Ready to take your running to the next level?
cta.description: Join today and get access to professional tools that help you reach your goals faster and safer.
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required to start.

hub.title: Train smarter,
hub.description: The all-in-one platform for physiological testing, AI-powered training programs, and athlete management. Built for everyone who takes performance seriously.

athletes.title: For Athletes
athletes.hubDescription: AI-powered daily workouts, race predictions, and training zones based on your physiology.

hero.title: Train based on
hero.description: Get daily workouts adapted to your readiness, training zones calculated from your lactate tests, and race predictions based on real data — not guesswork.

painPoints.title: Sound familiar?
painPoints.item0: Following generic plans that don't match your fitness level
painPoints.item1: No idea if you're training at the right intensity
painPoints.item2: Guessing your race pace instead of knowing it
painPoints.item3: Training hard on days your body needs recovery

features.title: Everything you need to perform
features.description: Tools that elite athletes use — now available to you.

aiWod.title: AI Daily Workout
aiWod.description: A personalized workout every day, adjusted to your readiness, fatigue, and training plan.

readiness.title: Readiness & HRV
readiness.description: Daily health check that tells you whether to push hard or take it easy.

racePrediction.title: Race Prediction
racePrediction.description: See your predicted 10K, half marathon, and marathon times based on your actual data.

zones.title: Zone Calculation
zones.description: Exact training zones from lactate tests — heart rate, pace, and power.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Track your development over time with clear graphs and trend analysis.

sync.title: Strava & Garmin Sync
sync.description: Automatic import of workouts from your favorite devices and apps.

cta.title: Ready to train smarter?
cta.description: Sign up free and connect with your coach — or train on your own with AI-powered guidance.

coaches.title: For Coaches
coaches.hubDescription: AI studio, program builder, test reports, and athlete monitoring in one platform.

hero.title: Coach smarter with
hero.description: Build training programs, analyze lactate tests, monitor athlete load, and use AI to scale your coaching — all from one platform.

painPoints.title: Sound familiar?
painPoints.item0: Spending hours on spreadsheets instead of coaching
painPoints.item1: No way to objectively track athlete load and injury risk
painPoints.item2: Lactate test results stuck in PDF reports nobody reads

features.title: Your digital coaching toolkit
features.description: Everything you need to deliver world-class coaching at scale.

aiStudio.title: AI Studio
aiStudio.description: Generate programs, analyze data, and get coaching suggestions powered by AI.

programBuilder.title: Program Builder
programBuilder.description: Build periodized training programs with 4 proven methodologies.

testReports.title: Test Reports
testReports.description: Professional lactate test reports with threshold detection and zone calculation.

monitoring.title: Athlete Monitoring
monitoring.description: Track training load, ACWR, readiness, and injury risk across your roster.

multiSport.title: Multi-Sport Support
multiSport.description: 17 sports with sport-specific dashboards, testing protocols, and training zones.

portal.title: Athlete Portal
portal.description: Your athletes get their own app with WOD, calendar, logging, and progress tracking.

cta.title: Ready to scale your coaching?
cta.description: Start your free trial and see how the platform transforms your workflow.
cta.subText: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

gyms.title: For Gyms & Studios
gyms.hubDescription: Team management, multi-coach access, custom branding, and testing as a revenue stream.

hero.title: Elevate your gym with
hero.description: Offer physiological testing as a premium service, manage multiple coaches, and give your members a world-class training experience.

painPoints.title: Sound familiar?
painPoints.item0: Members churn because they don't see measurable progress
painPoints.item1: No premium services to differentiate from competitors
painPoints.item2: Coaches work in silos with their own spreadsheets
painPoints.item3: Client data is lost when a coach leaves

features.title: Built for gym operations
features.description: Enterprise tools that grow with your business.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.description: Manage all your members, coaches, and staff from one central dashboard.

multiCoach.title: Multi-Coach Access
multiCoach.description: Multiple coaches work in the same system with role-based permissions.

branding.title: Custom Branding
branding.description: White-label reports and dashboards with your gym's logo and colors.

api.title: API Access
api.description: Integrate with your existing membership and booking systems.

dataContinuity.title: Data Continuity
dataContinuity.description: Client data stays with your business — even when coaches move on.

revenue.title: Testing as Revenue
revenue.description: Offer lactate testing and VO2max analysis as a premium paid service.

cta.title: Ready to stand out?
cta.description: Book a demo and see how performance testing can transform your gym.

clubs.title: For Sports Clubs
clubs.hubDescription: Batch testing, team leaderboards, injury monitoring, and season periodization.

hero.title: Develop your team with
hero.description: Run batch tests, track injury risk, build season plans, and give every athlete on your roster a personalized experience.

painPoints.title: Sound familiar?
painPoints.item0: Testing 30 athletes takes all day with paper forms
painPoints.item1: Injury rates spike because training load isn't monitored
painPoints.item2: No way to compare athletes or track team-wide trends
painPoints.item3: Physios and coaches work in separate systems

features.title: Purpose-built for team sports
features.description: From testing day to game day — one platform for the entire season.

batchTesting.title: Batch Testing
batchTesting.description: Test your entire squad efficiently with streamlined data entry and instant results.

leaderboards.title: Team Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Compare VO2max, thresholds, and test results across your roster.

acwr.title: ACWR Monitoring
acwr.description: Track acute:chronic workload ratio and get alerts before injuries happen.

physio.title: Physio Integration
physio.description: Physios manage rehab programs and restrictions that sync with training plans.

periodization.title: Season Periodization
periodization.description: Plan your entire season with periodized training blocks for peak performance.

sports.title: 17 Sports Supported
sports.description: Sport-specific testing protocols, dashboards, and training zones.

cta.title: Ready to level up your club?
cta.description: Contact us for a tailored solution for your organization.
cta.subText: Custom pricing for clubs and federations.
